comment:
* A parcelable filter that can be used for rerouting transitions to a remote. This is a local
 * representation so that the transition system doesn't need to make blocking queries over
 * binder.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: CONTAINER_ORDER_ANY
variables.comment: The associated requirement doesn't care about the z-order.

variables.name: CONTAINER_ORDER_TOP
variables.comment: The associated requirement only matches the top-most (z-order) container.

variables.name: mTypeSet
variables.comment:
* When non-null: this is a list of transition types that this filter applies to. This filter
     * will fail for transitions that aren't one of these types.

variables.name: mFlags
variables.comment: All flags must be set on a transition.

variables.name: mNotFlags
variables.comment: All flags must NOT be set on a transition.

variables.name: mRequirements
variables.comment: * A list of required changes. To pass, a transition must meet all requirements.

methods.name: public boolean matches(@NonNull TransitionInfo info)
methods.comment: @return true if `info` meets all the requirements to pass this filter.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
